text: is a Japanese sprinter. He competed in the men's 4 × 400 metres relay at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==Personal best== {| class="wikitable" style=text- align:center |- !Event !Time (s) !Competition !Venue !Date !Notes |- |400 m |45.69 |Ekopa Track Games |Fukuroi, Japan |2 November 2013 | |- |} ==International competition== {| class="wikitable sortable" style=text- align:center |- !Year !Competition !Venue !Position !Event !Time !Notes |- !colspan="7"|Representing |- |rowspan=5|2014 |World Indoor Championships |Sopot, Poland |10th (h) |4×400 m relay |3:12.63 (relay leg: 3rd) | |- |rowspan=2|World Junior Championships |rowspan=2|Eugene, United States |bgcolor="silver"|2nd |400 m |46.17 | |- |bgcolor="silver"|2nd |4×400 m relay |3:04.11 (relay leg: 4th) | |- |rowspan=2|Asian Games |rowspan=2|Incheon, South Korea |5th |400 m |46.13 | |- |bgcolor="gold"|1st |4×400 m relay |3:01.88 (relay leg: 4th) | |- |2015 |World University Games |Gwangju, South Korea |bgcolor="silver"|2nd |4×400 m relay |3:07.75 (relay leg: 2nd) | |- |2016 |Olympic Games |Rio de Janeiro, Brazil |13th (h) |4×400 m relay |3:02.95 (relay leg: 4th) | |- |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male sprinters Category:Olympic athletes of Japan Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Universiade medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Universiade silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 2015 Summer Universiade
title: Nobuya Kato
